item.title: B0ardcasts on Mixcloud
item.description: Here’s a link to the Mixcloud page with the past couple of B0ardcast shows and tracklistings.. The B0ardside Episode #4 - 03/04/2014 by Sideb0ard on Mixcloud

item.title: The B0ardcast Cometh
item.description: Woop! I just got confirmation on friday that I’ll have a regular weekly 2 hour radio starting this tuesday on bff.fm - a recent new station out of here in San Francisco. Tune in - 2pm-4pm PST (10pm-Midnite UK) –
